name: BARADRONE SOCIAL WELFARE INSTITUTION

address: Village & P.O. Baradrone, Block - Diamond Harbour 1, District - South 24 Parganas

briefDescription: Baradrone Social Welfare Institution (BSWI) reaches to more than 50000 population in various villages of West Bengal and provides training and technical assistance in non-formal education, community development, maternal and child health, school governance, integrated literacy, small enterprise development, Livelihood development (on-farm & off farm), HIV/AIDS education and awareness and women’s empowerment. BSWI also works to strengthen literacy, adult basic education and health programs in collaboration with government departments. BSWI’s projects are designed to contribute to individual growth, as well as to community and area development.
